reviewtext: Using inline with my Sennheiser headphones. Control wheel in cavity of housing, so vol. control won't get accidently turned, and it stays where you set it. Good volume range easy to set to right level. Cord a bit long, when adding to my already long earphones cord, but I just coil up the volume control extra ! Good 1/8" plug fit one end and strain relief on other end at cord. Getting another for my Koss headphones. Clip on it, to affix to like a belt.
